g1.title: AWS OPERATOR - Real Amazon Web Services Integration
g1.description: Complete executeAwsOperator() with AWS SDK v3, multi-service support (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda), credential chain, region failover, cost optimization

g2.title: AZURE OPERATOR - Real Microsoft Azure Integration
g2.description: Complete executeAzureOperator() with Azure SDK, multi-service support (VM, Storage, SQL, Functions), service principal auth, ARM templates, DevOps integration

g3.title: GCP OPERATOR - Real Google Cloud Platform Integration
g3.description: Complete executeGcpOperator() with Google Cloud client libraries, multi-service support (Compute, Storage, BigQuery), service account auth, Deployment Manager

g4.title: KUBERNETES OPERATOR - Real Container Orchestration
g4.description: Complete executeKubernetesOperator() with official k8s client, cluster management, RBAC, resource management, Helm charts, CRD support

g5.title: DOCKER OPERATOR - Real Container Management
g5.description: Complete executeDockerOperator() with Docker Engine API, image building, container lifecycle, volume/network management, Compose support, registry integration

g6.title: TERRAFORM OPERATOR - Real Infrastructure as Code
g6.description: Complete executeTerraformOperator() with plan/apply/destroy operations, multi-cloud support, state management, variable handling, drift detection
